long_description: ERGObaby teething pads extend the life of your ERGObaby carrier by reducing washings. Enjoy peace of mind, knowing your little one is teething on 100% cotton. Sturdy snaps make it easy to fasten teething pads around your carrier's shoulder straps.
short_description: ERGObaby teething pads extend the life of your ERGObaby carrier by reducing washings. Enjoy peace of mind, knowing your little one is teething on 100% cotton.
